Text: @bychance its me, i uploaded it.i probably should have zipped it first (i deleted my original installer) but i assure you no viruses and that is the real game. if you do have any problems i can find the installer and reupload it. so dont hesitate to let me know if i n00bed up the joint
the installer was just a zip file btw. no system files, registry, desktop shortcuts, dlls, etc. just a folder with thies files in it
